alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 6:35AM EST until January 01 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River near Linn Grove. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The flooding of county roads begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.8 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
